name: Spooky Santa Dental Surgery
description:
Spooky Santa Dental Surgery

Best Santa Christmas dentist game for children! Little Santa needs your help!You are the Dentist and the Surgeon and this Christmas Santa and his friends: Rudolph, Snowman and Elf need your help!
You come to rescue them by fixing their teeth problem.
You are equipped with lots of tools, so you can clean, pull and pluck on their teeth, to make their problems go away!
What are you waiting for? Become a Dentist now and let's help your patients, Santa and all his friends. Enjoy this best kids game and please share this with your friends!
